text.text: THE CARPETFACTORY AND THE JADECARVING FACTORY AREALWAYS THEFAVOURITES OFOVERSEAS TOURISTS
上海的地毯厂、玉雕厂是外宾很喜欢去的地方。
Ms Wang:Have youhad a good time in shanghal?
王小姐:在上海玩得开心吗?
Mr.Lee:Oh, I justgot here yesterday. So Ihaven't really seen anythingyet. Can you introducesome interesting places?
李先生:噢，我昨天刚到。所以哪儿都没有去过呢。你能不能介绍一些有趣的地方?
Ms Wang: Yes,Let me see. Oh, the CarpetFactory and the Jade CarvingFactory are always thefavourites of overseas tourists.Would you like to visit them?
王小姐:有，让我想想，噢，上海的地毯厂、玉雕厂是外宾很喜欢去的地方。你想去看看吗?
Mr.Lee:Are they farfrom the city proper?
李先生:这些地方离市区远吗?
Ms Wang:Hmm,yes,You have to go there by car.
王小姐:嗯，挺远的，你得坐车去。
